General.Name: Skeena Resources Ltd
General.Description: Skeena Resources Limited engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, and other precious metal deposits. Its flagship property is the Eskay Creek project which covers a total of 7,666.02 hectares, with 51 mineral claims totaling 5,835.76 hectares, and eight mineral leases totaling 1,830.26 hectares located in the Golden Triangle region of British Columbia, Canada. The company was formerly known as Prolific Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Skeena Resources Limited in June 1990. Skeena Resources Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1133 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4E5
